description: Let A(n) = #{(i,j,k): i^2 + j^2 + k^2 <= n}, V(n) = (4/3)Pi*n^(3/2), P(n) = A(n) - V(n); A000092 gives values of n where |P(n)| sets a new record; sequence gives A(A00092(n)).
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: W. C. Mitchell, The number of lattice points in a k-dimensional hypersphere, Math. Comp., 20 (1966), 300-310.
mathematica: P[n_] := (s = Sum[SquaresR[3, k], {k, 0, n}]) - Round[(4/3)*Pi*n^(3/2)]; record = 0; A000092 = Join[{1}, Reap[For[n = 1, n <= 10^4, n++, If[(p = Abs[P[n]]) > record, record = p; Print[s]; Sow[s]]]][[2, 1]]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 08 2016, after _M. F. Hasler_ in A000092 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
